@dartt The only way I can truly figure out how to make such a sprawling, varied narrative work is by constant rashomon flashbacks and retellings

@chrizmillr Understand you are playing with different forms of narrative and this is some kind of quasi comedic Rashomon, but the series should have been a 90 minute film. Needs to be faster, more transgressive, funnier. Some inspired bits but it drags at 7-8 hours.

@Muddledprospect Atsushi could feel his eye twitch in annoyance. Was this guy really his boss? 

He poked a finger at Rashomon, the tip of his finger grazing over a spike as he suppressed an eyeroll. "... I suppose you're right." He said, leaning back and away from the active ability."
